description: Gooey baked feta with honey and thyme can be whipped up in 20 minutes, making it a perfect starter for any festive gathering.
name: Baked Feta With Honey & Thyme Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 90g Rosemary chia & saltbush crackers, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fanforced. Pat feta dry with paper towel. Place feta in a small ovenproof frying pan. Brush all over with oil. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until soft but not melted.
Remove feta from the oven and heat the oven grill to high. Brush feta all over with 1 tbs honey. Grill for 2 minutes or until golden around the edges and feta is just starting to bubble.
Drizzle with remaining honey. Top with thyme and season with pepper. Serve with crackers.
